default.default.notes: this is the original discussion format for dasha-sip-test, preserving for view

mainIntroduction.text: Hello,I'm Chris'sz assistant... My name is Liizzz D Wiiill... How are you doing today?

howAreYouPositive.text: That's wonderful to hear,,, I'm doing great myself as well.

howAreYouNegative.text: That's unfortunate,,, but hopefully he or I can help.

offerAssistance.text: So,,, what can I help you with today?

offerMessage.text: Understood,,, would you prefer I send him a message?

callerTimeout.text: Hey... It appears you've gone quiet, if you're having phone issues you're more than welcome to try us again anytime... Hope you have a wonderful day.

hangUp.text: I understand, Chris and I hope you have a wonderful day. Good bye.

hold.text: Okay, please hold a moment while I check his availability.

unavailable.text: It appears he's unable to accept any calls right now... Is it okay if I leave him a message?
